summary: This document contains detailed property information for 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, including ownership details, comparable sales, and property characteristics. It highlights the property's assessed value, sale history, and comparable properties in the area. This document contains various property transaction records related to real estate in Palm Beach, Florida, including sales prices, dates, and ownership details. It highlights transactions involving notable individuals and properties associated with Jeffrey Epstein, including a quit claim deed for a property at 358 El Brillo Way. This document provides detailed information about the property located at 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL, including nearby public and private schools, their distances from the property, and various statistics related to the schools. It serves as a resource for understanding the educational landscape surrounding the property.

keyFacts: The property at 358 El Brillo Way is a single-family residential property with 7 bedrooms and 7 bathrooms.
The property was sold for $21,000,000 on December 23, 2011.
The assessed total value of the property as of 2018 is $12,469,301.
The document includes comparable sales data for properties in the Palm Beach area.
Several individuals are mentioned as owners or sellers in various comparable transactions.
Jeffrey Epstein sold the property at 358 El Brillo Way to Laurel Inc on December 23, 2011.
Michael Smith purchased a property from Lynn Zimmer for $51,775,500 on June 18, 2018.
Ruth Silberstein sold a property for $51,500,000 on March 8, 2019.
Richard J Dozor sold a property for $52,114,187 on April 10, 2019.

The property at 358 El Brillo Way is a single-family residential property.
Nearby public schools include Palm Beach Public School, Belvedere Elementary School, and Conniston Middle School.
Nearby private schools include St Juliana School, Hope Christian School, and Cardinal Newman High School.
The report includes various statistics such as student-teacher ratios and total enrollment for the listed schools.
